item.title: Honey: Sweetness and healing properties in one:
item.description: There are 8,000year-old cave paintings in Valencia, Spain that show humans carrying baskets and gourds to gather honey from wild bee hives.

item.title: Rising Carbon Dioxide Levels May Threaten Pollen's Protein And Impact Honeybees:
item.description: Native bee species and honeybees rely on flowering plants for energy and nutrition. In fact, pollen is the sole source of protein for bees. If the protein ...
